ranking.description: Claude Code superpowers: core skills library
ranking.description_ja: Claude Code superpowers: core skills library
ranking.readme_summary: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code

ranking.description: Source code for the X Recommendation Algorithm
ranking.description_ja: Source code for the X Recommendation Algorithm
ranking.readme_summary: X's Recommendation Algorithm X's Recommendation Algorithm is a set of services and jobs that are responsible for serving feeds of posts and other content across all X product surfaces (e.g. For You Timeline, Search, Explore, Notifications). For an introduction to how the algorithm works, please refer to our engineering blog
ranking.readme_summary_ja: X's Recommendation Algorithm X's Recommendation Algorithm is a set of services and jobs that are responsible for serving feeds of posts and other content across all X product surfaces (e.g. For You Timeline, Search, Explore, Notifications). ranking.description: This Ansible collection provides battle tested hardening for Linux, SSH, nginx, MySQL
ranking.description_ja: This Ansible collection provides battle tested hardening for Linux, SSH, nginx, MySQL

ranking.description: ðŸ¤– The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

ranking.description: TalkToFigma: MCP integration between Cursor and Figma, allowing Cursor Agentic AI to communicate with Figma for reading designs and modifying them programmatically.
ranking.description_ja: TalkToFigma: MCP integration between Cursor and Figma, allowing Cursor Agentic AI to communicate with Figma for reading designs and modifying them programmatically.
ranking.readme_summary: Cursor Talk to Figma MCP This project implements a Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration between Cursor AI and Figma, allowing Cursor to communicate with Figma for reading designs and modifying them programmatically. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/129a14d2-ed73-470f-9a4c-2240b2a4885c Project Structure - src/talk_to_figma_mcp/ - TypeScript MCP server for Figma integration - src/cursor_mcp_plugin/ - Figma plugin for communicating with Cursor - src/socket.ts - WebSocket server that f...

ranking.description: Force Remove Copilot, Recall and More in Windows 11
ranking.description_ja: Force Remove Copilot, Recall and More in Windows 11
ranking.readme_summary: Remove Windows Ai Why? The current 25H2 build of Windows 11 and future builds will include increasingly more AI features and components. This script aims to remove ALL of these features to improve user experience, privacy and security. ---------------------- Script Features - **Disable Registry Keys** - Disable Copilot - Disable Recall - Disable Input I...
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Remove Windows Ai Why? The current 25H2 build of Windows 11 and future builds will include increasingly more AI features and components.
